Package org.torrent.coredata

Class Peer

java.lang.Object
org.torrent.coredata.Peer
public class Peer
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
mkg This class represents information about Peers that the client may connect to

    • getHandShake

      public byte[] getHandShake()
      Retrieves the handshake stored for this peer
      Returns:
      The handshake this peer has sent to the client

    • getReservedBytes

      public java.lang.String getReservedBytes​(byte[] handshake)
      Parameters:
      handshake - Extracts the reserved bytes section of the handshake
      Returns:
      A String where each digit represents a bit in the reserved bytes portion of the handshake

    • getProtocol

      public static java.lang.String getProtocol​(byte[] handshake)
      Parameters:
      handshake - Returns the protocol described in the received handshake
      Returns:
      A string representing the peer's desired protocol

    • getinfoHash

      public static byte[] getinfoHash​(byte[] handshake)
      obtain the infohash contained within the peer's handshake
      Parameters:
      handshake - The bytes representing the peer's handshake
      Returns:
      The infohash for the file the client desires

    • getPeerID

      public static byte[] getPeerID​(byte[] handshake)
      Returns the ID that the peer is using
      Parameters:
      handshake - The bytes representing the peer's handshake
      Returns:
      The peer's ID

    • bitfieldSent

      public boolean bitfieldSent()
      Checks whether the client has sent its bitfield to this peer
      Returns:
      True if the client has sent a bitfield to the peer, otherwise false

    • setBitfieldSent

      public void setBitfieldSent()
      Marks the client as having sent its bitfield to this peer

    • processHave

      public void processHave​(int piece)
      Updates this client's bitfield to represent the new piece it has obtained
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece this client now states it has
